verses.name: Ezekiel 24:25
verses.text: Also, thou son of man, shall it not be in the day when I take from them their strength, the joy of their glory, the desire of their eyes, and that whereupon they set their minds, their sons and their daughters,

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:26
verses.text: That he that escapeth in that day shall come unto thee, to cause thee to hear it with thine ears?

verses.name: Ezekiel 24:27
verses.text: In that day shall thy mouth be opened to him which is escaped, and thou shalt speak, and be no more dumb: and thou shalt be a sign unto them; and they shall know that I am the Lord.
